        public Snort(int height,
             int... width)
        Constructor for a blank game board with varying-length rows.
        Parameters:
        height - Height of the game board.
        width - Width of the row. Supply as many of these as there are rows (the height value).

      • getPosition

        public Snort getPosition(int moveSelection,
                         int currentPlayer)
        Gets the current game position.
        Parameters:
        moveSelection - The left-to-right numbering of the indicated vertex.
        currentPlayer - The number of the currently active player
        Returns:
        A new Snort game of the next game position, or null if an illegal move.
